definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: As far as the writing technique is concerned, the Tang poetry combined realism and romanticism.
sentences.chinese: 唐诗在创作方法上，现实主义与浪漫主义并举。

sentences.english: His realism theory is an essential component of his entire outlook of literature and art.
sentences.chinese: 他的现实主义理论又是其整个文艺观的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Socialist realism is undoubtedly the result of imagining collectively, worth reviewing.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义现实主义无疑是集体想像的结果，值得反思。

sentences.english: However, Maugham is generally considered a realistic writer.
sentences.chinese: 但总的来看，毛姆是一个现实主义作家。

sentences.english: Luld cs loathes expressionism and modernist art, but advocates realism.
sentences.chinese: 他憎恶表现主义和现代派艺术，提倡现实主义。
这种现实主义做法确实有先例可循。

sentences.english: Virtually all neo-realism of the film is to move the camera to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的新现实主义电影是将相机到地面。

sentences.english: The answer, of course, is political realism.
sentences.chinese: 当然，回答是政治上的现实主义。

sentences.english: The novel is characterized by sharp satire and critic realism.
sentences.chinese: 小说以辛辣的讽刺和批判的现实主义见长。

sentences.english: I've been cordially invited to join the visceral realists.
sentences.chinese: 他们盛情邀我加入本能现实主义派。

sentences.english: All three aspects form the new realism of Rasputin .
sentences.chinese: 这三者结合起来构成拉斯普京新的现实主义风格。

sentences.english: This issue was not faced in its brutal realism by General Gamelin.
sentences.chinese: 甘默林将军没有用无情的现实主义正视这一问题。

sentences.english: What happens is a sudden appearance of realism. Before 1420, faces were idealized.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的“不寻常情况”是指现实主义画派的突然出现。

sentences.english: This view is typically contrasted with nominalism and realism.
sentences.chinese: 这种观点是典型的对比与唯和现实主义。

sentences.english: Because sometimes paintings that are very detailed or realism,
sentences.chinese: 因为有时候图画很精细或很现实主义。

sentences.english: "Facticity"is the core principle on how to figure out the characters in the fictions.
sentences.chinese: “真实性”是现实主义小说人物塑造的核心原则。
